description.narrative: IR19: Capacity of primary schools enhanced to provide appropriate care and support for children with special needs including children with disabilities in at least 20 deprived districts,which contributes to Early Learning, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Equity â€“ Focus On Girls' And Inclusive Education. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Outcome 005 : The needs of out-of-school children aged 6-14 years, especially girls, children with special needs and OVCs are systematically assessed and addressed in disadvantaged areas in five focus regions

title.narrative: IR19: Capacity of primary schools enhanced to provide appropriate care and support for children with special needs including children with disabilities in at least 20 deprived districts

description.narrative: Guidelines for Education Sector Analysis for Inclusive Education piloted; findings on disability prevalence and data and capacity gaps strengthened the equity analysis to inform the sector plan. In-service teacher training module completed; and strategy in place to mainstream inclusivity in the ongoing pre-service teacher training reform. | Status:Met | As-of Date:21/12/2017

title.narrative: Number of focus districts where all schools (100%) are implementing Inclusive Education programmes
Number of Children with disabilities attending Primary School in the 20 focus districts
System Strengthening - Inclusive Ed. - Existence of curricula and support from teachers and school administrators that are inclusive of children with disabilities - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Inclusive Ed. - Existence of a physical environment in schools that is appropriate for children with disabilities - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Inclusive Ed. - Availability of materials and communication that support the inclusion of children with disabilities - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Inclusive Ed. - Existence of an EMIS that is inclusive of children with disabilities - score (1-4), see guidance
System Strengthening - Inclusive Ed. - Existence of appropriate law/policy explicitly mentioning the rights of children with disabilities to receive an education - score (1-4), see guidance
